name: hypernova_sample
description: This README would normally document whatever steps are necessary to get the application up and running.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run webpack
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test mocha --recursive frontend/test --reporter dot --timeout 10000 --compilers js:babel-register -r frontend/config/test/jsdom
scripts.test-cov: babel-node $(npm bin)/isparta cover --include 'frontend/javascripts/**/*.js' --report html --report text _mocha -- --recursive frontend/test --reporter dot --timeout 10000 --compilers js:babel-register -r frontend/config/test/jsdom
